attributes.action: Force the Government to break down the cost University fees and justify it.
attributes.background: The Government have continuously risen the cost of university fees and there is no justification as to why. Students are debt ridden and forced to pay this off for decades after their degree. The Government plan to again raise the fees and it is becoming more and more unfair and unacceptable.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
